frontmatter.title: Custom Angular Material Input Autocomplete form control
frontmatter.description: In this example I will use an Angular Material Autocomplete form control and show how to implement @angular/forms ControlValueAccessor interface to build a custom form control. The form control will display a message (like an option) while it waits for results and a message when no results were found, finally it will render any template for options found using TemplateRefs.
